t:
As all the lights in my neighborhood went out, a ringing silence fell over everything.




Then I heard my Google
Home in the next room,
laughing quietly.
c:
Soon it was joined by hysterical laughter from Alexa, Cortana and Siri from the other houses.



#blackout #laugh #artificialintelligence #scifishortstory #fallout #googleassistant #destruction #judgementday
